home.heroSubtitle: We boost your company's efficiency and protection with customized technological solutions.

history.title: Our History
history.text: Ludaut Automation and Security SAS is a company focused on electronic security, automation, and systems integration across various sectors such as hospitality, restaurant, recreational, commercial, tourism, residential, and industrial, with almost 5 years of experience. We believe that the security and well-being of our clients are the foundation for building tomorrow.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To design, install, and maintain cutting-edge protection and automation technologies, creating personalized experiences that inspire trust, foster lasting relationships, and allow our clients to operate with complete peace of mind and efficiency.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be a benchmark in Latin America for comprehensive electronic security solutions, where innovation and closeness to our clients transform their spaces into intelligent, reliable environments prepared for future challenges.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.text: We seek and apply the latest technologies to offer cutting-edge solutions.

commitment.title: Commitment
commitment.text: We are dedicated to the success and satisfaction of our clients.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.text: We act with honesty and transparency in all our interactions.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.text: We strive to exceed expectations in every project.

teamwork.title: Teamwork
teamwork.text: We collaborate to achieve common goals and potentiate our talents.

proactivity.title: Proactivity
proactivity.text: We anticipate our clients' needs to offer timely and effective solutions.

founders.title: Our Founders
founders.text: Our commitment is to transform spaces into intelligent and safe environments, where technology works for people.
founders.alt: Photo of Jordy Julián Pedraza, CEO & Founder

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We offer a wide range of customized solutions to meet your security and automation needs.

cctv.title: CCTV Systems
cctv.description: High-definition surveillance solutions with remote access and intelligent analytics to protect your assets 24/7.

accessControl.title: Access Control
accessControl.description: Biometric and card systems to manage and monitor access to your facilities safely and efficiently.

alarms.title: Intrusion Alarms
alarms.description: Smart alarm systems with immediate notifications to your mobile device, providing an immediate response to any event.

automation.title: Building Automation
automation.description: Integration of lighting, climate, and security systems to create intelligent and efficient buildings that adapt to your needs.

structuredCabling.title: Structured Cabling
structuredCabling.description: Design and installation of voice and data networks that guarantee a robust and reliable communication infrastructure.

fireDetection.title: Fire Detection
fireDetection.description: Early detection systems that protect lives and assets, complying with the highest safety standards.

lighting.title: Lighting Control
lighting.description: Creation of dynamic and efficient environments through automated control of lighting.

videoIntercom.title: Video Intercoms
videoIntercom.description: Modern systems that combine security, comfort, and effective communication for residential and corporate access.

renewableEnergy.title: Renewable Energy Systems
renewableEnergy.description: Sustainable electrical solutions that integrate solar photovoltaic technology to reduce costs and optimize energy consumption.
